name: api_rendering_ReflectionProbe
description: The reflection probe is used to capture the surroundings into a texture which is passed to the shaders and used for reflections.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The color with which the texture of reflection probe will be cleared.

properties.name: bakedTexture
properties.description: Reference to the baked texture of the reflection probe's surrounding.

properties.name: blendDistance
properties.description: Distance around probe used for blending (used in deferred probes).

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The probe's world space axis-aligned bounding box in which the probe can contribute to reflections (

properties.name: boxProjection
properties.description: Should this reflection probe use box projection?

properties.name: center
properties.description: The center of the probe's bounding box in which the probe can contribute to reflections. The center

properties.name: clearFlags
properties.description: How the reflection probe clears the background.

properties.name: cullingMask
properties.description: This is used to render parts of the reflecion probe's surrounding selectively.

properties.name: customBakedTexture
properties.description: Reference to the baked texture of the reflection probe's surrounding. Use this to assign custom refl

properties.name: farClipPlane
properties.description: The far clipping plane distance when rendering the probe.

properties.name: hdr
properties.description: Should this reflection probe use HDR rendering?

properties.name: importance
properties.description: Reflection probe importance.

properties.name: intensity
properties.description: The intensity modifier that is applied to the texture of reflection probe in the shader.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Should reflection probe texture be generated in the Editor (ReflectionProbeMode.Baked) or should pro

properties.name: nearClipPlane
properties.description: The near clipping plane distance when rendering the probe.

properties.name: realtimeTexture
properties.description: Reference to the real-time texture of the reflection probe's surroundings. Use this to assign a Rend

properties.name: refreshMode
properties.description: Sets the way the probe will refresh.Additional resources: ReflectionProbeRefreshMode.

properties.name: renderDynamicObjects
properties.description: Specifies whether Unity should render non-static GameObjects into the Reflection Probe. If you set t

properties.name: resolution
properties.description: Resolution of the underlying reflection texture in pixels.

properties.name: shadowDistance
properties.description: Shadow drawing distance when rendering the probe.
